name: René Brooks | Black Girl, Lost Keys | ADHD

content.value:
Doing the bare minimum when you’re depressed is valid. 
Doing the bare minimum when you’re in a pain flare is valid. 
Doing the bare minimum when chronic fatigue is kicking your ass is valid. 

Letting your body rest at the expense of your to-do list is NOT slacking off.
content.html: Doing the bare minimum when you’re depressed is valid. Doing the bare minimum when you’re in a pain flare is valid. Doing the bare minimum when chronic fatigue is kicking your ass is valid. Letting your body rest at the expense of your to-do list is NOT slacking off.
